title: Old Photos Falsely Shown as Army Casualties From Galwan Face-Off
subtitle: Images of Indian Soldiers Who Died in Galwan Fact Check: Two  images are being circulated with a false claim that they show the bodies of Indian Army soldiers who died in the violent face-off between the troops of India and China in Galwan Valley.
author: www.thequint.com
vclaim:
Two different images are being circulated to claim that they show the bodies of Indian Army soldiers who died in the violent face-off between the troops of India and China in the Galwan Valley on 15 June.

However, both the images are old and unrelated to the Galwan Valley incident. Let’s look at them one by one:
